description: Parthenon Productions plans to film a commercial featuring Mami in a river gorge. A local cave is known for a legend about a black buck, and when Toshio and Yuu, who arrived by train, go into the cave, they hear a voice coming from deep inside. Yuu discovers that the voice is coming from a stalagmite, and when she lifts a stone, a small black deer appears. When Yuu hurries to the filming site, numerous accidents occur, and Nega believes that the little deer is at fault.
